job_tasks.phrase: Creating new or refining existing data processing pipelines that will run on very large amounts of data.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of building and maintaining data pipelines, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: help develop our LLM-based TTS system that will provide our customers with voice clones that are indistinguishable from real voices.
job_tasks.justification: Developing an LLM-based TTS system involves building and refining generative models for speech synthesis.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking hypotheses, ideas or papers and creating implementations of solutions on the back of these.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of translating research or ideas into functional model implementations.

job_tasks.phrase: Running experiments on the back of the created implementations to evaluate and verify your hypotheses.
job_tasks.justification: Experimentation and evaluation are fundamental to the model development and refinement process.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on model training and inference optimisation.
job_tasks.justification: Model training and inference optimization are core activities within the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Contributing to a high-quality codebase, developing tests where necessary, and participating in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: This describes standard software development practices focused on code quality and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping a team of Research engineers and Scientists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This involves contributing to and defining software engineering best practices within a team.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the development of robust, production-ready software with end-to-end ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the transition of research prototypes into functional, deployed solutions, a key software development task.
Owning production pipelines falls under the umbrella of MLOps, managing the lifecycle of ML models in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This describes comprehensive responsibility for the entire ML lifecycle, including deployment and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Our aim is to make video content creation available for all - not only to studio production!
job_tasks.justification: This statement articulates the business vision and goal that the technical work aims to support.

job_tasks.phrase: create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the specific product vision and business outcome the role contributes to.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
loves to code and build working systems
used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment
Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams
Helping a team of Research engineers and Scientists

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing an LLM-based TTS system and mentions specific generative AI technologies like Voicebox and VALL-E. The role involves building production-ready software around these models, including prompt engineering, fine-tuning implications (though not explicitly stated, implied by TTS development), and full ML lifecycle ownership for these generative applications.
